name: Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc.
description: Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc. is a leading global supplier of frozen potato products, including French fries, potato wedges, and specialty potato products. Founded in 1941 and headquartered in Eagle, Idaho, Lamb Weston has established a strong presence in the food industry, serving customers in over 100 countries. The company operates multiple manufacturing facilities and distribution centers across North America and internationally, ensuring a consistent supply of high-quality products. Lamb Weston is committed to innovation, focusing on developing new products and processes to meet the evolving tastes and preferences of consumers. Their portfolio includes a variety of offerings catering to foodservice, retail, and industrial customers, with an emphasis on sustainability and responsible sourcing practices. The company aims to enhance the quality of food experiences for its customers while prioritizing environmental stewardship and community engagement. Lamb Weston is dedicated to providing exceptional service and support to its partners, leveraging its extensive industry expertise to drive growth and success in the frozen food market. As a public company listed on the New York Stock Exchange, Lamb Weston continues to expand its global reach and enhance its position as a trusted leader in the frozen potato industry.

seo.meta_title: Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc. | Frozen Potato Products Supplier
seo.meta_description: Learn about Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc., a global leader in frozen potato products. Explore their commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainable practices.

faq.question: What products does Lamb Weston offer?
faq.answer: Lamb Weston offers a wide range of frozen potato products, including French fries, potato wedges, and specialty potato products.

faq.question: Where is Lamb Weston headquartered?
faq.answer: Lamb Weston is headquartered in Eagle, Idaho, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lamb Weston?
faq.answer: The CEO of Lamb Weston is Tom Werner.
